title: Reconnect botton does't do anything ...
body:
Hello, Im Clicking on the Reconnect botton but nothing happen ... No message or loading screen .. What can i do ... I dont have any firewall activated :(

Thx for help

replies.body: Hmmmm try checking out the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if you can get your network linked up with our game servers again. If that doesn't help, grab that games network logs and pop them into our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) to test for any packet loss.
